title: Shaco skin is bugged
body: Shaco masked skin animations are bugged and are not the right ones for the skin. Before they were blue and have different particles and stuff and now they are the same as the classic shaco skin

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ This is a known issue on our part, and you should see a fix for this in the next patch (6.23).
It's not out of the question, but a definite yes/no answer isn't something I'm able to give you. D:

My last question is are u gonna buff shaco or change him back? he weaker now then ever before, i dont think its fair that a champion that was fine and wasnt played much got nerfed while the other assi. go a rework that makes them just as good or even better than before

Im just asking this because iv been going through the whole boards and no one at Riot had said anything about shaco since the "rework"
I'm on the skins team, so this is something I honestly don't have any idea about. D:
